title: Wtf? people are still banning blitz over thresh?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/yNPaX3g.jpg
Do you see blitzcrank harassing your adc from a safe distance with procs autos, giving free shields to everyone and their mom, free flash, massive r%%%%%edly op aoe slow, a q that last for ages, and a aoe knock up that literally discourages engages?

Riot should hand out an IQ test to these people, and if they fail then that's to bad no more ranking games for you until you become smarter.

INB4 thresh mains and riot employees downvotes me
Alpha,male,out,!
